ComicInfo.Summary: The Fiend impales and takes the Dragon to Debbie Harris' cemetery, while Overlord puts down attempts on his life, and the Police learn of Frank Darling's defeat of Skullface. The Dragon is attacked by many corpses brought to life by the Fiend, including that of Debbie Harris.

ComicInfo.Title: Dance of the Dead
